title: Cycle #64
content:
We received 1.40316900 BTC stacking rewards.

Rewards were wrapped to 1.39652180 xBTC:

  • btc transfer tx: https://mempool.space/tx/00c7077e1d1c054cc393349662b3e5439da53a970d3ddfe79f2456c0638fd29e,

  • xbtc mint tx: https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0xf4ef3ed4c957b2489982c7163ab74624f8e715b9bff0c29135c8c1a3f637e137?chain=mainnet

xBTC were swapped to 68,049.011569 STX at a rate of 2052 sats/stx:

  • https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0xd385f044b4eb0d3d5efcb0caef0ea202e75cbae931ca063fef9624e78ccd8d8c?chain=mainnet

68.049,011142 STX were distributed to 2 city coin contracts and 860 pool members.
